sentences.sContent: You should keep in with your colleagues.
sentences.sContent_eng: You should keep in with your colleagues.
sentences.sCn: 你应当与你的同事友好相处。

sentences.sContent: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.sContent_eng: You should not deprecate your own worth.
sentences.sCn: 你不应该贬低你自己的价值。
